SEARCH
Package igym.services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
igym.services.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing user operations, handling business logic, and interacting with the repository layer.

This service receives requests from the controller layer, applies necessary validations and transformations, and persists or retrieves user-related data.

      public List<User> findAll()
      Retrieves all users in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all users

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(UUID id)
      Performs a logical deletion (inactivation) of a user and their associated gyms.
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID of the user to inactivate
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist or is already inactive

    • createUser

      public User createUser(User user)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user entity to be saved
      Returns:
      the saved user entity
      Throws:
      DuplicateUserException - if a user with the same name already exists

    • updateUser

      public User updateUser(UUID id, String name)
      Updates the name of an existing user.
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID of the user to update
      name - the new name for the user
      Returns:
      the updated user entity
      Throws:
      DuplicateUserException - if a user with the same new name already exists
      UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist

    • findById

      public User findById(UUID id)
      Retrieves a user by their ID, ensuring they are active.
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID of the user
      Returns:
      the found user entity
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user does not exist or is inactive
